name: ReasonsToTravel
0:
”Alexa, open Travel Reasons”
”Alexa, start Travel Reasons”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: travel reasons
des: This Alexa skill will give you a random reason for leaving your house right now and travelling the world. We live on an amazing planet, full of adventure and rich culture, and Reasons To Travel gets you motivated to experience it all.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
